competitors.name: Oracle HCM Cloud
competitors.notes: Leading cloud HCM solution with strong user experience

competitors.name: SAP SuccessFactors
competitors.notes: Cloud-native HCM suite for global companies

competitors.name: ADP Vantage HCM
competitors.notes: Comprehensive HR platform with strong analytics capabilities

competitors.name: Ultimate Software
competitors.notes: Cloud-based HCM and payroll platform (UKG Pro today)

competitors.name: Ceridian Dayforce
competitors.notes: Unified HCM platform with payroll, benefits, workforce management

competitors.name: BambooHR

context: By 2015, Workday had established itself as a major cloud HCM player. The competitive landscape featured mature cloud competitors like Oracle HCM Cloud and SAP SuccessFactors.
